component.name: customItem
component.script:
sub init() m.Poster = m.top.findNode("poster") m.ProgressRectangle = m.top.findNode("ProgressRectangle") m.MaskRectangle = m.top.findNode("maskRectangle") m.title = m.top.findNode("epi_title") end sub
sub showcontent() m.title.text = m.top.itemContent.Title itemcontent = m.top.itemContent sec = createObject("roRegistrySection", "MySection") if sec.Exists(itemcontent.id) readJsonString = sec.read(itemcontent.id) readJsonObject = parseJson(readJsonString) duration = Val(readJsonObject.duration) timestamp = readJsonObject.time m.ProgressRectangle.width = 262*(timestamp/duration) end if m.title.text = m.top.itemContent.Title m.Poster.uri = itemcontent.HDPOSTERURL end sub
